晣字的基本解释

晣
zhé
同“晢”。

晣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhé］［zhì］
［《廣韻》旨熱切，入薛，章。］
［《廣韻》征例切，去祭，章。］
亦作“晣1”。
(1)光亮；亮光。
(2)明白；明显。
(3)通“哲”。明智。
(4)晳，色白。参见“晢白”。

晣字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　晣； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页496第04
【集韻】同晢。【詩·小雅】庭燎晣晣。【傳】晣晣，明也。【朱傳】小明也。【類篇】或作㫼。

晣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
晣字的起名意思

同“晢”，有明智，光芒闪耀之义。

晣
Basic explanation of words
晣
zhé
Same as "晢".
晣
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhé］［zhì］
["Guangyun" aims eagerly, enters Xue, Zhang. ]
["Guangyun" case cut, go to sacrifice, chapter. ]
Also known as "Chen 1".
(1) Bright; bright light.
(2) Understand; Obvious.
(3) Through "Zhe". wise.
(4) Clear and white. See "Zai Bai".
晣
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　晣; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 496 04
【Ji Yun】The same as the 晢. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Ting Liao 晣晣晣. 【Biography】Chen Ye, Ming Ye. [Zhu Chuan] Xiao Ming also. [Class articles] Or make 㫼.

晣
Name meaning
Same as "晢", has the meaning of being wise and shining.
